ComicInfo.Summary:
Now, with Golem’s secret on the table, and the return of an old ally, Robyn is shouldering more weight than she has ever in her life. Can she handle everything as her friend’s life hangs in the balance, as well as the very soul of the city she calls home at risk? Robyn must tread carefully as she plots her next move and plan of action. Also, if that wasn’t enough, someone dies in this issue!
Don’t miss this next issue in Robyn’s craziest adventure yet!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Martin Coccolo & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Jason Cardy | 3 | D | Cover D | John Royle, Chance Wolf & Sebastian Cheng | 4 | E | Black Friday Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | VIP Black Friday Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Black Friday Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | Black Friday Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
